I had some issues though while downloading, im using bittorrent and the all so annoying error msg:

"error: The requested operation cannot be performed on a file with a user-mapped section open."

kept popping up every now and then. I don't really know what the error msg means but it had something to do with my Kaspersky Internet Security 2011. When I disabled my KIS2011 and resumed the download, the error msg somehow stopped. I know this is a very risky move and I wouldn't advice anyone to follow this method but it was the only way I could avoid the above error msg. The torrent is safe and clean btw :)

@benfarmin, dude you have to copy the no-cd crack file to your installation directory, the installation directory is where the game i.e. in your case Empire Earth 2 is installed. By default your installation directory is located here: 

C:\Program Files\Sierra\Empire Earth II

One way you can navigate to the EE2 installation directory is by right clicking on the EE2 shortcut on your desktop > click on "Properties" > click on the "Shortcut" tab > click on "Find Target" > When you click on "Find Target", a window opens, that window is your "Installation Directory". Alternatively, you can use "Windows Explorer" to locate the directory.

Now go to the folder where you downloaded "Empire Earth 2 - full with crack&kg". 

Look for a folder named "Crack", open that folder, there will be 2 files in there, one is the No-CD Crack file named "EE2" and another one is the Keygen named "rld-ee2kg". The "No-CD Crack" is the file with the Empire Earth 2 icon or is named "EE2". "Right Click" on the file "EE2", click on "Copy". Go to your Empire Earth 2 "Installation Directory", "Right Click" > Click on "Paste". When prompted to replace the file with the existing file, click on "Ok" or "Yes" to confirm.

Run/Open Empire Earth 2 and everything should be OK.

Enjoy :)
